title: Looking to buy 1 or 2 Signed T206 Cards
author: ksemmel

posts.post_title: Looking to buy 1 or 2 Signed T206 Cards
posts.post_content:
As the title states, looking for 1-2 signed T206 cards to have as a conversation piece/item to pass down, etc.

Criteria:
Must be a HOFer
Must be slabbed 
No paper loss on front

Please price your item as I do not feel comfortable making blind offers on items.
I have one that I am thinking of moving but it is not a HOF player
